entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -1.0°C

Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -5.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow with risk of snow squalls. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
